titles.title: A resolution designating the month of September 2022 as "Macedonian American Heritage Month" and celebrating the language, history, and culture of Macedonian Americans and their incredible contributions to the United States.

A resolution designating the month of September 2022 as "Macedonian American Heritage Month" and celebrating the language, history, and culture of Macedonian Americans and their incredible contributions to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
This resolution designates September 2022 as Macedonian American Heritage Month.
The resolution also expresses warm congratulations and best wishes to all Macedonian people around the world as they mark Macedonian Independence Day.
Finally, the resolution praises the integral role of Macedonian Americans in the economy, culture, and identity of the United States.
